general_advisory: Farmers are advised to give necessary irrigation to fields and vegetable crops. In specific crop advisories, various treatments and preventions are recommended to control diseases and pests.

advisory: Farmers advised to give necessary irrigation to field & vegetable crops.
Apply granular herbicide Bensulfuron - methyl + Pretilachlor @ 4kg / acre after transplanting.
Remove disease & pest infected plants in Ratoon crop and dispose them with recommended fertilizer application.
Sugarcane Sett treatment with (Metalaxyl + Mancozeb)@2g/l of water is recommended.
Spraying of (Tebuconazole + Sulphur) @500g/acre recommended to reduce incidence of diseases.
Control aphids during pest infestation using Neem Based Pesticide.
Control aphids by spraying Dimethoate 30% EC.
Spray Neem-based pesticide to prevent infestation.
Sow Recommended HYV/Hybrid of Cucurbits after treating seeds with Imidachloprid.
Spray Acephate to minimize damage caused by Red Pumpkin Bettle in cucurbits.
Apply Neem or Karanjaa cake to prevent wilting in plants.
Provide support for better growth of Tomato plants.
Spray Thiamethoxam to control sucking insect pests.
Apply Emamectin benzoate or Spinosad to control leaf eating caterpillar and fruit borer.
Feed fishes daily with oil cake bran mixture at the recommended rate.
Provide mineral mixture along with salt regularly to animals.
Include wheat grains, jaggery, etc. in the daily ration during winter season.
